title: StockHedges
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Micron shares plunge on weak second-quarter guidance
items.description: Micron shares plunged in extended trading after the chipmaker issued weaker-than-expected second-quarter guidance.

items.title: Nike CEO Elliott Hill outlines new strategy after retailer blames promotions for declining revenue and profit
items.description: Nike beat Wall Street's expectations on the top and bottom lines under new CEO Elliott Hill.

items.title: Gold Futures Rise, Starting 2025 on Positive Note
items.description: Gold futures rose, beginning the new year on a positive note, as investors await fresh catalysts to decide the direction of precious metals.

items.title: Darden Restaurants stock climbs as Olive Garden, LongHorn Steakhouse fuel sales growth
items.description: Darden Restaurants met Wall Street's expectations for its fiscal second-quarter results.

items.title: Costco quarter signals record stock run is not done yet. Here's our new price target
items.description: With gross margins and paid memberships trending higher, this rally to fresh highs can continue.

items.title: Stock Futures Rise to Start New Year
items.description: Technology stocks were leading gains in premarket trading, with chip stocks and cryptocurrency-linked names rising.

items.title: Oil Prices Rise on Chinese Demand Optimism
items.description: Oil rose with optimism boosted by Chinese leader Xi Jinping’s annual New Year’s address in which he said the country is on an upward trajectory.

items.title: Sterling Extends Losses Against Dollar After U.K. PMI Data
items.description: Sterling extended losses versus the dollar after a key measure of U.K. manufacturing activity was revised down further into contractionary territory.

items.title: Big Retail Gets Bigger as Smaller Players Struggle
items.description: Walmart, Amazon and Costco are growing faster than the rest of retail and investing to stay ahead.

items.title: AI chipmaker Broadcom shares soar 17% despite mixed quarterly results — here's why
items.description: We're increasing our price target on the stock after a slew of positive AI updates.
